comment: unclear reaction, multi-step reaction The products of the strF and/or strG genes may be involved in the formation of N-methyl-L-glucosamine moiety of Streptomycin.
definition: D-Glucose 1-phosphate + Nucleoside triphosphate + Amino group donor + Activated methyl group <=> NDP-N-methyl-L-glucosamine + Orthophosphate
